name: Weng Santos
text: But ang running mate nya, si BBM.  Na by vote din lang makakapwesto, at hindi pwedeng i-appoint for 1 year, and whoesever she appoints will need the agreement of the Commission on Appointments (who are lawmakers, mostly), so this means also na ang labanan talaga ay sa choice of senators  =)

source_obj.text: But ang running mate nya, si BBM.  Na by vote din lang makakapwesto, at hindi pwedeng i-appoint for 1 year, and whoesever she appoints will need the agreement of the Commission on Appointments (who are lawmakers, mostly), so this means also na ang labanan talaga ay sa choice of senators  =)
